meta.description: Determine the number of cash-based and card-only ticket machines to minimize the total number of machines while meeting processing and paper usage requirements.

params.name: processing_capacity
params.description: Processing capacity of each machine type in people per hour

params.name: paper_usage
params.description: Paper usage of each machine type in rolls per hour

vars.name: num_machines
vars.description: Number of each type of machine to be bought

objective.name: min_total_machines
objective.description: Minimize the total number of machines

constraints.name: processing_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 people can be processed per hour

constraints.name: paper_limit
constraints.description: Ensure no more than 90 rolls of paper are used per hour

constraints.name: card_machine_limit
constraints.description: The number of card-only machines must not exceed the number of cash-based machines
